about_the_game:
"Snail's Knock Out" is a casual shooting game featuring Snail, who loves battles, from "Goonya Monster".

After the chaos of "Goonya Monster," Snail's love for battle explodes in boredom!? Blast away the appearing undead to your heart's content, shooting and dodging in stages that gradually speed up!

Avoid what falls and hit the undead to blast them away!
Hitting rocks or undead reduces HP, so avoid rocks and aim to attack the undead!
Speed up as you progress!
As time passes, the stage speed increases along with Snail's tension, so control Snail quickly!
Pick up weapons and fight with your favorite weapon!
Laser! Gatling! Arrow! Use the unique characteristics of weapons to blast away enemies!
Defeating the undead that appear in the stage will drop souls. Collect souls to level up and strengthen your weapons!
Sweep away with bombs! Clear the way!
When the bomb gauge is full, press the skill button to shoot bombs continuously and blast away all visible undead!
Local Rankings
Your score will be recorded in the top 10. Keep challenging yourself to surpass your past records!

movies.name: スネイルのぶっとばしたーい_予告動画

name: Snail's Knock Out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! Enemy in sight? Throw bombs! Blast away! "Snail's Knock Out" is a casual shooting game. Blast away the undead appearing in stages with increasing speed and relieve accumulated stress!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
